pr_title: DROOLS-5131: Extend coverage of boxed list expression

timeline.message:
DROOLS-5131: Extend coverage

This PR extends coverage of appending list expression entry

During this coverage extension a new issue was found https://issues.redhat.com/browse/KOGITO-1581
This PR serves also as reproducer for this new issue.

timeline.bodyText: You could be consistent with your use of final in this class.
timeline.author: manstis

timeline.bodyText: It's not a "Decision table" in this test.
timeline.author: manstis
